thread.title: Xenoblade Chronicles 2 announced for Nintendo Switch
thread.title_full: Xenoblade Chronicles 2 announced for Nintendo Switch

title: Xenoblade Chronicles 2 announced for Nintendo Switch
text:
Xenoblade Chronicles 2 announced for Nintendo Switch Gameplay trailer shows Monolith Soft's latest in action. By Jeffrey Matulef Published 13/01/2017 
Monolith Soft just announced Xenoblade Chronicles 2 for the Nintendo Switch. 
Nintendo revealed the following gameplay trailer showing how this open-world RPG sequel will look on its upcoming hardware. 
Eurogamer contributor Simon Parkin called 2011's Xenoblade Chronicles a "towering triumph" in his review , noting that "no Japanese RPG has more successfully married its various components this hardware generation." Sometimes we include links to online retail stores. If you click on one and make a purchase we may receive a small commission. For more information, go here . About Jeffrey Matulef 
Jeffrey Matulef is the best-dressed man in 1984. Based in Portland, OR he operates as Eurogamer's US news editor.
